concept.title: Manage P3P Policy
concept.shortdesc: The Manage P3P Policy page lets you upload your organization's P3P policy.

conbody.p: Analytics > Admin > Company Settings > P3P Policy
Web browsers use the P3P policy privacy settings when browsing your website. For more information about P3P, visit the Platform for Privacy Preferences project website.
If you do not upload a privacy policy, Analytics uses a default policy. Your P3P policy is available from only under the following conditions:

ul.li: The visitorNamespace variable is declared in your web beacon (s_code.js).
Data is collected using a standard domain (2o7.net or omtrdc.net).

conbody.p: If your web site's data collection does not meet these requirements, marketing reports provide a default P3P policy.

Adobe maintains a list of the collection domains for your company, so that P3P is served for the appropriate domains. To update this list, have your organization's supported user contact Customer Care.

row.entry: The path to your organization's P3P policy file. Typically, a website's full P3P policy is contained in an XML file (/w3c/p3p.xml ).
The compact policy definition. Your website includes the compact policy as part of the HTTP header so Web browsers can process the policy before displaying the web page.
